pr_title: Define package of the class before defining the class in JetClassLoader

timeline.message: define package of the class before defining the class in JetClassLoader

timeline.bodyText:
This method was deprecated in java9. I've read a bit why, but am not sure how to fix it in java8. But it's only an issue if multiple class loaders define the same packages, but I'd say it's not common. The purpose of defining the package is to make package annotations available, and if one uses package annotations, he doesn't use a package name that's likely to be used in some other library...
So consider this comment just a thinking aloud, we can live with this code for a while :)
timeline.author: viliam-durina

replies.bodyText: Maybe we can rather rely on ignoring the IArgExc. Or re-verify there just, as URLClassLoader does.
